19671013dafecabd35a958afb460e600 (00:47): i'm building an html5 player, quite rudimentary, based on video for everybody, implements overlays, and uses thumbnails to swap video in player. Video swapping works great in webkit browsers, but not firefox (well it does in ff 4 osx, but not 3.6xx)
19671013dafecabd35a958afb460e600 (00:47): I'm doing a standard ('#videoPlayer').attr('src', 'src video .ogv) type approach
19671013dafecabd35a958afb460e600 (00:48): it is technically swapping the source in firefox, but its not loading it into the player
19671013dafecabd35a958afb460e600 (00:48): in webkit- it will load the new video into the current player, however, in ff, the previous video keeps playing..
19671013dafecabd35a958afb460e600 (00:49): I do not know about the differences between webkit and mozilla when it comes to html5 video and the DOM
19671013dafecabd35a958afb460e600 (00:49): anyone know?

19671013dafecabd35a958afb460e600 (00:51): whats canplay?
19671013dafecabd35a958afb460e600 (00:51): i was hoping you'd respond  24a51cd4129fd476eb5f2174c2daa360 :)
